availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Rufus K. Irwin (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, insurance agent.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, insurance agent. Virginia native. Married to Eliza Thompson Irwin. Father of Elizabeth Irwin, George Irwin, Nelly Irwin, and William Irwin. Insurance agent in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Kate Carroll and Anna Hellman as domestic servants in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 2, p. 585.
Pennsylvania, U. S., Death Certificates, 1906-1968, Pennsylvania Historic and Museum Commission, Harrisburg, PA, File #36206.
